name: Save The Princess (winded_blues, LoortSoFt, BorisFromMurmansk, Laffyn)
name_original: Save The Princess (winded_blues, LoortSoFt, BorisFromMurmansk, Laffyn)
description:
Your lovely princess was stolen by evil monster. You need to save her. No matter what.

Controls: move left by A, right by D and jump by Spacebar

This game is made for Wowie Jam 3.0.  We will update it to full version soon after results.

Creators:
